name: The Slime is a Witch
description:
A 2D platformer where you play as a friendly slime who decided to become a witch, and escape from society.

Currently only available for Windows, Linux, and Mac OS.

Keyboard settings:

Use WASD or arrow keys to move

Press z to shoot

Press x or space bar to jump (Press twice to double jump)

Press escape to quit the game

The game currently consists of 5 levels. I am not looking to increase the number of levels any time soon. 

If you have any questions, feel free to leave them down below. Any feedback are appreciated. Just remember that this is my first Unity game, and a lot of the features can be improved, or refined.

Source code available at: https://github.com/FesterTY/The-Slime-is-a-Witch
